name: Gamesense Operation
description:
Gamesense Operation is a fast-paced tactical game, where player take on the role of a special agent tasked with saving Wish from dangerous situation. With realistic environment and challenging missions, player must utilize their strategy and quick thinking to navigate through hostile territory, disarm threats, and extract Wish to safety. Game is still in development, so you may encounter some bugs/missing features, but apart from that have fun! BTW thanks @jo211el1 for letting me use your graffiti as icon!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/seff9_

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@seff9696
